description.english: Recruited eight archers
description.german: hast du acht Bogenschützen angeheuert.
description.french: Huit archers ont été recrutés.
description.italian: Hai ingaggiato otto arcieri.
description.spanish: Reclutaste ocho arqueros.
description.schinese: 招募八名弓箭手
description.tchinese: 你雇傭了8名弓箭手。
description.japanese: 射手を8人雇った
description.brazilian: Recrutou oito arqueiros

description.english: You got free walls.
description.german: Hast du kostenlose Mauern bekommen.
description.french: Vous avez obtenus des murs gratuits.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto mura libere.
description.spanish: Conseguiste muros gratuitos
description.schinese: 您得到了自由之墙。
description.tchinese: 你建起了幾面空牆。
description.japanese: 無料の壁を手に入れた
description.brazilian: Você conseguiu muros grátis

description.english: You started your camp.
description.german: Hast du dein Lager aufgeschlagen.
description.french: Vous avez commencé votre campement.
description.italian: Hai avviato il tuo accampamento.
description.spanish: Levantaste tu campamento.
description.schinese: 您开始安营扎寨。
description.tchinese: 你建起了營地。
description.japanese: キャンプを開始した
description.brazilian: Você criou seu acampamento

description.english: You hunted 40 or more critters.
description.german: Hast du 40 oder mehr Hasen gejagt.
description.french: Vous avez chassé 40 lapins ou plus.
description.italian: Hai cacciato 40 o più conigli.
description.spanish: Ya habías cazado 40 conejos o más.
description.schinese: 您猎杀了40只或更多的兔子。
description.tchinese: 你捕獵了40多隻野兔。
description.japanese: ウサギを40匹以上狩った
description.brazilian: Você caçou 40 coelhos ou mais

description.english: You didn't kill anything.
description.german: Hast du gar nichts getötet.
description.french: Vous n’avez rien tué.
description.italian: Non hai ucciso niente.
description.spanish: No habías matado nada.
description.schinese: 您什么也没杀。
description.tchinese: 你沒有擊殺任何敵人。
description.japanese: までに何も倒さなかった
description.brazilian: Você não matou nada

description.english: You had more gold than you could carry.
description.german: Hattest du mehr Gold als du tragen konntest.
description.french: Vous êtes couvert d’or.
description.italian: Possedevi più oro di quanto ne potessi trasportare.
description.koreana: 차 운반할 수 있는 것보다 더 많은 골드를 모았습니다.
description.spanish: Tenías más oro del que podías llevar.
description.schinese: 您得到的金子多得都拿不动了。
description.tchinese: 你得到了超出可攜帶數量的金幣。
description.russian: у вас золота больше, чем вы можете унести.
description.japanese: 持ちきれないほどの金を得た
description.brazilian: Você arranjou mais ouro do que poderia carregar

description.english: You cleared an acre of land.
description.german: Hast du einen Acker leergeräumt.
description.french: Vous avez défriché un hectare de terrain.
description.italian: Hai liberato mezzo ettaro di terra.
description.spanish: Despejaste un acre de tierra.
description.schinese: 您清理了一英亩的国土。
description.tchinese: 你把一英畝的土地清理乾淨了。
description.japanese: 土地を1エーカー支配した
description.brazilian: Você liberou um acre de terra

description.english: You forged a new Crown
description.german: Hast du eine neue Krone geschmiedet.
description.french: Vous avez forgé une nouvelle couronne.
description.italian: Hai forgiato una nuova corona.
description.spanish: Ya te habías forjado una nueva corona.
description.schinese: 您打造了一个新的王冠
description.tchinese: 你鍛造了一頂新皇冠
description.japanese: までに新しい王冠を鍛造した
description.brazilian: Você forjou uma nova Coroa

description.english: You held a Gem
description.german: Hast du einen Juwel gehalten.
description.french: Vous avez tenu une joyau.
description.italian: Possedevi una gemma.
description.spanish: Tuviste en tus manos una gema.
description.schinese: 您获得了一块宝石
description.tchinese: 你獲得了一顆寶石。
description.russian: вы держали в руках драгоценный камень.
description.japanese: 宝石を得た
description.brazilian: Você segurou uma Joia

description.english: You destroyed a portal.
description.german: Hast du eine Pforte zerstört.
description.french: Vous avez détruit un portail.
description.italian: Hai distrutto un portale.
description.spanish: Ya habías destruido un portal.
description.schinese: 您摧毁了一个传送门。
description.tchinese: 你毀掉了一扇傳送門。
description.japanese: までに異界の門を破壊した
description.brazilian: Você destruiu um portal

description.english: Sail away before day 6!
description.german: Segel vor Tag 6 davon!
description.french: Naviguez avant le 6e jour !

description.schinese: 在第6日之前就扬帆起航！
description.tchinese: 在第6天前乘船離開！
description.japanese: 5日目までに出航した！
description.brazilian: Veleje para longe antes do dia 6!

description.english: Ride 4 different steeds on the same land

description.italian: Cavalca 4 destrieri diversi sulla stessa terra

description.tchinese: 在同一塊土地上騎4種不同的馬

description.brazilian: Cavalgue em 4 cavalos diferentes no mesmo território

displayName.english: Is a Hermit still a Hermit if they have friends?
displayName.german: Ist ein Einsiedler noch immer ein Einsiedler wenn er Freunde hat?
displayName.french: Un ermite avec des amis est-il toujours un ermite ?
displayName.italian: Un eremita è ancora un eremita se ha degli amici?

displayName.schinese: 如果隐士有朋友，他还是隐士吗？
displayName.tchinese: 如果隱士交到了朋友，那他們還算是隱士嗎？
displayName.russian: Отшельник с друзьями — все еще отшельник?
displayName.japanese: 友達ができたら世捨て人ではなくなる？

description.english: Put 4 hermits on the same boat

description.english: I have 20 max-level towers on a single land

description.brazilian: Derrote os inimigos nos 6 territórios

displayName.italian: LA GRANDE FORZA È CON ME!

description.english: Unlock all Items of Power (Solve All Puzzles)
description.german: Schalte alle Objekte der Macht frei (löse alle Rätsel).
description.french: Débloquer tous les objets de pouvoir (résoudre toutes les énigmes)
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli oggetti potere (risolvi tutti i rompicapi)
description.koreana: 파워 아이템을 모두 잠금 해제하세요. (모든 퍼즐을 푸세요.)
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los objetos de poder (resuelve todos los puzles).
description.schinese: 解锁所有权力物品（破解所有谜题）
description.tchinese: 解鎖所有力量物品（解開所有謎題）
description.russian: Открыть все символы силы (решить все головоломки)
description.japanese: パワーのアイテムを全て解放した（パズルを全て解いた）
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os Itens de Poder (resolva todos os quebra-cabeças)
